mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CUR_0 AS Sour, CURDEN_0 AS Dist, CHGRAT_0 AS Rate, CHGSTRDAT_0 AS StartDate, LEAD(CHGSTRDAT_0,1,GETDATE()) OVER (PARTITION BY CUR_0,CURDEN_0 ORDER BY CHGSTRDAT_0 ASC) AS EndDate FROM EXPLOIT.TABCHANGE WHERE CUR_0=#{Sour} AND CURDEN_0=#{Dest} ) AS T1 WHERE CONVERT(datetime, #{Date},120) != T1.EndDate AND CONVERT(datetime, #{Date},120) BETWEEN T1.StartDate AND T1.EndDate
